Name: Toki Tori
About the game: The gameplay in Toki Tori is a blend of two genres. While it looks like a platform game, it's a puzzle game at heart. To progress through the game, the player must pick up each egg in a level using a set number of tools. Players will have to look and plan ahead carefully while using items such as the Telewarp, Freeze-o-Matic and InstantRockâ„¢. Additional tools are gradually introduced as the player progresses through the game's 80+ levels covering four unique worlds. A wide variety of items and weapons 80 levels spread over 4 large worlds Dozens of hours of gameplay For all ages - accessible and hard levels available Catchy music and sound effects Steam Achievements Full screen HD graphics Shader effects 5.1 Surround Soundtrack Controls designed for mouse, keyboard as well as joypad
